text_block_list.text: Rewinding back to a few days before the Selection Race…

It was a weekend, and walking along the riverbank, 
I spotted Eishin Flash training. But…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —— Haa… haa… Time for a break…

It looks like she's been training pretty hard. From the pained 
expression on her face, I could tell she was exhausted.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Hahh… phew… Break time is over…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Haah… Next up ——
choice_data_list: You should rest a little longer…!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……? And you are…?

I introduced myself as a trainer at Tracen Academy 
and attempted to tell her she looked like she still 
needed rest, but ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: No… haah. …It will not prove a hindrance. Short breaks are part of my program.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Fatigue is expected around 15:00 — that is, right now. 
I can rest more in the 30 minute break coming up.

It sounds like she has absolute confidence in her program 
and is adamant about sticking to it. However…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I keep a margin. For example, this chat with you 
has caused a 4 minute and 25 second delay…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, that's fine. I can simply subtract it from my next 
five minute break to get back on track.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I know full well I'm pushing it a little. I put together 
a packed program to reach my target, which leaves 
me less time to spare than usual.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Completing this program is my top priority. 
If not, I……

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Five minutes and 45 seconds have passed. 
I can't lose any more time, so if you'll excuse me…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …I forgot to say… Thank you for your concern. Goodbye.
Eishin Flash is really putting in the effort for her next race… But I have to say, I get the feeling she's trying too hard.

For sure, the Selection Races are important, but there are 
several opportunities throughout the year. As I pondered 
why she was so set on debuting right now ——

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Good～ day～ to～ you～～ ☆ 
Can Falco have a little chat?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
—— I'm sharing a room with Flash. 
So I know she's working reeaaally hard right now.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: …Hehe. Of course! Please keep this off the record, okay?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Flash's parents are coming from Germany 
to watch the upcoming Selection Race!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Her parents own a popular cake shop, you know? 
Both of them are super busy, so Flash is really excited 
that they're coming over.

I now understood the reason for her efforts, and why she'd 
want to stake it all on this race. But even if it's for her own 
development, why does she stick so strictly to her program?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: At any rate, I think that's all Falco can say right now?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Iiit's because… something hit me like be-beep, I guess ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
When I saw you two talking, I thought you looked like… 
someone who would understand Flash's qualities ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You've taken an interest in her, right? 
…So make sure you watch over her ☆

—— The day before the Selection Race. I walked around the 
academy, pondering the meaning of Smart Falcon's words…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Toi toi toi…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……Ah… you… We met the other day……

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …It's a German spell that I learned from my parents.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Tap a desk three times while repeating "toi toi toi". 
The sound is said to ward off evil and protect from bad luck.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It may just be superstition, but I want to ensure 
that nothing unforeseen happens tomorrow…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
…That's not really it. Tomorrow, my parents will take time 
out of their busy schedule to come and watch my race.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Properly executing the correct actions will bring perfect results. 
Demonstrating that is my obligation as their daughter.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Because I'm certain they would be highly disappointed 
if I was to… miss expectations and do terribly…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …What do you mean?

I don't know much about her, much less her parents. 
But anyone who sees her run can tell that she is a very 
hard worker.
choice_data_list: I think you can take pride in your efforts.
I think you can be proud of your efforts.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Fallacious comments. Meaningless encouragement… 
which tramples upon logic and reason…

I just noticed something's off about her. 
She keeps having to catch her breath and looks unwell…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
…This program might be a little excessive, but I have 
completed everything required to improve.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That is to say, this degree of malaise is within expectations. 
I'm resting up today and will recover by tomorrow.

…I can't feel an ounce of vigour in her words. 
Expecting a full recovery by tomorrow seems far-fetched…
choice_data_list: <size=34>You should considering taking tomorrow off a—</size>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Ridiculous!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I have every plan to run tomorrow. I worked hard to achieve 
the perfect result known as winning the race…!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I will execute my plans without a single deviation and follow 
the procedures I established. If I can't… can't… do ——
(Thud…)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Everything will be… thrown off ——
